title: [Self-directed] Augmented Reality-based Virtual Laboratory for Electro-pneumatic Practical Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic electrical circuits and fundamental concepts of pneumatic systems
context.additional_context: Students experience augmented reality content via personal smartphones or tablets, engaging in simulation-based learning resembling actual laboratory environments

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain the components and operating principles of electro-pneumatic systems through 3D modeling.
Learners can enhance their ability to design electro-pneumatic circuits and solve problems using augmented reality marker-based simulations.
Learners can analyze and explain real-world applications of pneumatic systems through eight practical worksheets.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
